metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2343 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0044.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> the fix for this CVE added a new issue, CVE-2022-2522. when addressing this we should make sure to fix CVE-2022-2522 as well. in versions earlier than jammy, the vulnerable code is in ins_compl_add_infercase method.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
